text:
I cannot load the module for Php4 in the 2.0.45 installation. It works fine in 
2.0.36. I tried several variations (moved dll file, changed directory, put dll 
file in system folder). Here is the line that causes the problem. The file is 
in the correct directory--and this works fine with 2.0.36.

LoadModule php4_module "c:/Program Files/Utilities/php-4.2.1-
Win32/sapi/php4apache2.dll"
creator: richards-john@sc.edu
slive@apache.org
text:
As stated in the release announcement, 2.0.45 is binary compatible only with
modules compiled for 2.0.42 or later.  You need to get a new version of PHP.
